byline.contributor: Katie Benner contributed reporting from San Francisco and Steve Lohr from New York.

lead_paragraph: The company tries to forge ahead despite a constantly shifting chess match of deal discussions and considerations.

headline.print_headline: Twitter Is Said to Still Be in Talks With Salesforce
headline.main: Twitter Is Said to Be in Continued Talks With Salesforce

snippet: The company tries to forge ahead despite a constantly shifting chess match of deal discussions and considerations....
abstract: Twitter is continuing negotiations to sell itself to Salesforce.com, with insiders saying chief exec Jack Dorsey is less resistant to move, despite his ongoing concerns social media company would be sold for parts; growing investor skepticism over Twitter's future is pressuring firm to make move that will stabilize stock and avoid shareholder activism.
